titleStmt.title: [The dialoges of creatures moralysed Applyably and edificatyfly, to euery mery and iocounde mater, of late tra[n]slated out of latyn into our Englysshe tonge right profitable to the gouernaunce of man. And they be to sell, vpo[n] Powlys churche yarde.
Dialogus creaturarum optimé moralizatus. Dialogo xx. English.
titleStmt.author: Nicolaus, Pergaminus, attributed name.
Mayno, de' Mayneri, d. 1368, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jan van Doesborch? and sold in Paul's churchyard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Dialogus creaturarum optimé moralizatus", variously attributed to Nicolaus Pergaminus and to Mayno de' Mayneri.
Place of publication, conjectured printer, and conjectured publication date from STC.
The final leaf contains woodcuts on recto and verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
